about.title: About us
about.dec1: Your Fitness Club is located in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia in July 2024 and is a haven for individuals and organizations.
about.dec2: It is a great honor to be a part of the world's most prestigious organization and to be a part of the world's most prestigious group of people.
about.dec3: Our goal is to be the leading fitness destination in Saudi Arabia, renowned for its commitment to health and fitness.
about.dec4: Personal training Customized guidance and support from certified trainers to help you achieve your goals with a nutritional program to get a perfect body
about.dec5: - The electrical stimulation device is the latest technology in the world of fitness based on sports movements in accordance with electrical impulses targeting the main muscles

footer.title: Our goal is to provide high-level training in a friendly environment

story.title3: We aim to be the leading destination for women in Saudi Arabia looking for a comprehensive and distinctive fitness experience, by providing sports services and psychosocial support to encourage a healthy and sustainable lifestyle.
story.storyDec: Our vision is to create a sporting environment that empowers women of all backgrounds and fitness levels to achieve their personal health and fitness goals. We believe that every woman has the power to make a positive change in her life. By providing the necessary support and guidance, we endeavour to be a trusted partner in her journey towards personal excellence. Our goal is to be the go-to destination for women to develop themselves and reach their full potential.
story.visionDec: We aspire to be the first and leading destination for women seeking a holistic fitness experience in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. We aim to revolutionise the way women approach their health and fitness, by offering services that go beyond exercise to include psychosocial support and encourage women to adopt a healthy and sustainable lifestyle.
story.messageDec: To provide an integrated sporting experience that combines quality and innovation, and aims to promote the overall health and well-being of women in Saudi Arabia. We are committed to providing a sporting environment that encourages personal and collective growth and meets the needs of women at all stages of their lives
